Announcements & News.
- Here you can find useful info about upcoming changes like new events, updates, fixes and other news. Its strongly recommended to check those pserver daily, stay informed all the time, it may be important!

Server Information.
- Here you can find all the informations about server like rates, detailed server features, all our event list and their reward as well some other gameplay informations so make sure to check here for more server details.

Server Statistics.
- Here you can check various server statistics like TOP PVP or PK, Clan Status, Top Online and others. You can also check raid status and to see if they are alive or not.

Support & Donations.
- Here you can find informations regarding our support for in-game problems or client related, you can find also informations on how to contact us and detailed Donate info as well.

Donate Rules
Donate Rules:
:: By donating, you must read and agree to all of the terms below:
1) You agree, that you are not purchasing any services or goods. Your donation is just a support to keep our server alive. 2) You agree that all donations are voluntary and made of your own accord. 3) You agree, that upon donating to our server, all transactions are final and are not able to be refunded. 4) If your game account gets terminated for any reason, you are not entitled to any reimbursement or refund. 5) Virtual Donation Gifts will not be restored if lost, stolen or dropped in game. 6) You will not request any gift not on the lists for Eros-War.com server. 7) Becoming a donator does not entitle you to any favoritism in game. 8) There are no item refunds/exchanges given so be sure you request exactly what you want. 9) All members are equals and must apply to the server rules, otherwise it will lead on punishment. 10) If you do not agree to these terms or cannot honor them do not make a donation.

Player Commands.
- Here you can find informations regarding our support for in-game problems or client related, you can find also informations on how to contact us and detailed Donate info as well.
